history.title: About Living Sky Casino
history.description2: Living Sky Casino is a modern gaming venue with a welcoming atmosphere. Guests can enjoy a wide selection of slot machines and electronic tables. The casino offers a convenient location and a spacious floor for comfortable leisure. Inside, there is a restaurant and bar with a diverse menu.
history.description3: Entertainment events and live shows are held regularly. The casino prioritizes safety and responsible gaming practices. Friendly staff ensures a high level of service. It combines excitement, relaxation, and cultural experiences. A great choice for gaming and entertainment enthusiasts. There is something for everyone here.

customHtml.title: Living Sky Casino — A World of Excitement and Comfort
customHtml.description:
Living Sky Casino welcomes guests with a stylish modern design and a warm atmosphere. The spacious gaming halls are designed to create a sense of comfort while highlighting the thrill of the experience. Every detail of the interior is crafted for enjoyment and vibrant impressions.


The casino operates daily, offering flexible hours for visitors’ convenience. It’s a place where you can spend an evening anytime, enjoying games and entertainment without rush or restrictions.


Inside, you’ll find bars and a restaurant serving a variety of dishes and drinks. The bar’s ambiance is perfect for socializing and relaxing after gaming. For those planning an extended stay, nearby hotels provide excellent accommodations.


Living Sky Casino is known for its events: concerts, themed parties, and live shows create a festive atmosphere. It’s more than just a casino — it’s an entertainment hub where something exciting is always happening.


Special attention is given to bonus programs and loyalty rewards. New guests enjoy welcome offers, while regular players receive exclusive benefits. This makes every visit both rewarding and memorable.


Convenience and Service at Living Sky Casino

The staff at Living Sky Casino primarily communicates in English, ensuring a high level of service and readiness to assist every guest. The atmosphere of friendliness and professionalism makes the experience comfortable even for first-time visitors.


Various payment methods are accepted, including debit and credit cards as well as cash. The casino also supports modern electronic payment options, allowing guests to choose the most convenient way to deposit funds. All transactions are processed quickly and securely.


ATMs are available on-site for easy cash withdrawals when needed. Additionally, currency exchange services are offered, which is especially convenient for international travelers. These amenities help guests avoid unnecessary hassle and focus on enjoying their time.


Living Sky Casino aims to provide maximum comfort by offering not only gaming but a full range of services. Everything is designed to make your visit pleasant, convenient, and safe.


Visiting Rules at Living Sky Casino

Living Sky Casino prioritizes guest comfort and safety by offering clear visiting guidelines. The dress code is casual, but neat and appropriate attire is recommended to match the venue’s atmosphere. Entry is allowed only for adults, with a minimum age of 19. A valid ID must be presented for age verification.


Bringing weapons, illegal substances, or personal alcoholic beverages is strictly prohibited. Aggressive behavior or any disturbance of public order is not tolerated. These rules ensure a secure and enjoyable environment for all visitors.


For convenience, there is a spacious parking area near the casino. Guests can arrive via the Trans-Canada Highway, by taxi, or public transportation. Nearby hotels make the visit comfortable for travelers.


These guidelines help maintain a high level of service and an atmosphere where every guest feels safe and welcome.


  • • Dress code: neat casual attire
  • • Age: 19+ with valid ID
  • • Prohibited: weapons, drugs, own alcohol
  • • Parking: free, near the casino
  • • Getting there: car, taxi, public transport

Players Club — Your Advantage at Living Sky Casino

The loyalty program at Living Sky Casino is called Players Club, and it’s free for all guests aged 19 and over. Registration takes just a few minutes: present your ID at the Players Club desk or sign up online. Once registered, you receive a personalized card that unlocks bonuses and exclusive benefits.


The main advantage of the program is earning points every time you play. Points can be redeemed for cash directly at slot machines, discounts on dining, and event tickets. For example, 1,000 points = $5 cashback, plus free play rewards and birthday bonuses. The program works across all seven SIGA casinos, making it convenient for frequent players.


Players Club offers tier levels that unlock additional perks and exclusive promotions. The more you play, the higher your status and the greater the benefits: from free show tickets to entry into member-only draws. Members also enjoy presale access to entertainment events and special promotions.


This system is designed to make every visit not only exciting but rewarding. Regular guests appreciate the chance to earn real money, discounts, and gifts for their activity.


  • • Registration: free, ID required, age 19+
  • • How to earn: 1 point per $1 on slots, 1 point per $5 on electronic tables
  • • Bonuses: 1,000 points = $5 cashback, 10% dining discount, free birthday play
  • • Levels: higher status = more perks
  • • Privileges: presale tickets, exclusive promos, member-only draws

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Living Sky Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at Living Sky Casino

Living Sky Casino offers guests not only thrilling games but also a wide range of bonuses and special promotions that make every visit rewarding and memorable. There are welcome offers for new players, seasonal events with prize draws, and exclusive deals for entertainment lovers. The casino regularly hosts slot tournaments with additional cash prizes. Guests also enjoy bonuses during festive occasions such as Christmas and New Year.


Special attention is given to themed parties and live shows, often accompanied by giveaways and free play offers. On selected days, promotions like “Double Points” or “Happy Hour” increase winning opportunities. For high rollers, VIP packages provide enhanced limits and exclusive rewards.


These offers create a festive atmosphere and give guests the chance to enjoy more than just gaming. Living Sky Casino ensures every visitor feels special and wants to return.


  • • Welcome Bonus: up to $100 on first deposits
  • • Slot Tournaments: prizes up to $5,000
  • • Seasonal Promotions: Christmas prize draws and cashback
  • • Happy Hour: double points and free spins
  • • VIP Offers: exclusive bonuses and higher limits
  • • Concerts & Shows: tickets plus prize giveaways
  • • Birthday Bonus: free play on your special day

Popular Games at Living Sky Casino

Living Sky Casino features over 200 slot machines and electronic table games, offering a wide variety for gaming enthusiasts. The focus is on slots, including classic machines and modern video slots with vibrant graphics and bonus features. Progressive jackpots are a major attraction, reaching millions of dollars and adding extra excitement to the experience.


In addition to slots, guests can enjoy electronic versions of table games through The Circuit, where live dealers host games in real time. This setup combines the thrill of traditional casino play with the convenience of digital technology. Popular options include blackjack, roulette, and poker in electronic format.


The game selection caters to both beginners and high rollers, with bets starting at just one cent and higher limits available for those who prefer big stakes. The casino frequently updates its collection with new titles and themed slots to keep the experience fresh and engaging.


  • • The Walking Dead — slot with bonus rounds and multipliers
  • • Buffalo Stampede — classic slot featuring progressive jackpots
  • • Wild Fury — vibrant slot with free spins
  • • Lucky Larry — high-volatility game with big wins
  • • Majestic Gorilla — slot offering large payouts and bonuses
  • • Star Rise — modern slot with innovative features
  • • Electronic tables: blackjack, roulette, poker with live dealers

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Living Sky Casino

Living Sky Casino offers flexible betting options for players of all budgets. You can start with small bets, while high rollers enjoy generous limits. This approach makes the casino appealing to both beginners and experienced players.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines 0.01 CAD 100 CAD
Electronic Blackjack 5 CAD 500 CAD
Electronic Roulette 1 CAD 200 CAD
Video Poker 0.25 CAD 50 CAD

Events and Entertainment at Living Sky Casino

Living Sky Casino is not just about gaming — it’s a hub for vibrant events and entertainment. Regular concerts, themed parties, and live shows create a festive atmosphere for guests. Visitors can enjoy live music, performances by popular artists, and comedy acts. These events take place in a spacious venue equipped with professional lighting and sound systems, making every occasion unforgettable.


Special attention is given to regular entertainment programs. The casino hosts weekly music nights, karaoke sessions, and dance shows. For nightlife enthusiasts, the bar transforms into a club with DJ sets, offering the perfect spot to relax and party after gaming.


Seasonal events are a highlight at Living Sky Casino. Christmas, New Year, and other holidays feature exclusive parties with prize draws, free play offers, and special bonuses. Summer festivals and themed days add variety and attract visitors from near and far.


Additionally, Living Sky Casino provides entertainment packages for groups and corporate clients. These include private parties, show programs, and gourmet experiences. Every event is designed to make guests feel special and keep them coming back.


  • • Live concerts: performances by artists and bands
  • • Themed parties: Christmas, New Year, summer festivals
  • • Karaoke nights: weekly programs for music lovers
  • • DJ sets: nightclub-style entertainment in the bar
  • • Comedy shows: stand-up and fun acts
  • • Prize draws: during holidays and special promotions
  • • Corporate events: private parties and custom shows

Bars, Restaurants, and Relaxation at Living Sky Casino

Living Sky Casino offers guests not only gaming excitement but also a comfortable leisure experience with diverse dining and entertainment options. Inside the casino, you’ll find a modern restaurant serving a wide range of dishes — from light snacks to full-course meals. The menu caters to various tastes, featuring local specialties and popular international cuisine. It’s the perfect spot to take a break from gaming and enjoy quality food.


For beverage lovers, there’s a stylish bar offering cocktails, wines, and premium spirits. The bar often becomes the center of evening entertainment, hosting DJ sets and live music, creating a vibrant nightclub atmosphere. Guests can relax, socialize, and immerse themselves in the festive vibe.


Hotels located near the casino provide convenient accommodations for travelers and those planning an extended stay. Their proximity makes visiting Living Sky Casino easy and safe, even for guests coming from afar. Some hotels offer packages that include dinner and tickets to casino events.


Living Sky Casino focuses on a complete leisure experience: gaming, dining, nightlife, and cultural events all in one place. It’s a destination where you can spend the entire day enjoying entertainment and comfort.


  • • Living Sky Restaurant: local and international cuisine
  • • Cocktail Bar: evening DJ sets, live music
  • • Nearby Hotels: comfortable stays, dinner packages
  • • Lounge Areas: spaces for relaxation and socializing

items.title: Is there an entrance fee?
items.answer: No, entry to the casino is free for all adult guests.

items.title: Is the casino open 24/7?
items.answer: No, it operates daily from morning until late night (usually until 2:00 AM).
